ygData.subject: Re: Side effect/Symptom of twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing that I find, that I assume is related to twinking,  is low level characters, begging for money or Items.  Probably because their previous character
ygData.messageBody:
One thing that I find, that I assume is related to twinking, is low level
characters, begging for money or Items. Probably because their previous
character was twinked by some high level char and they didn't have to work
hard to get up in the world. And then they either moved servers, or deleted
their previous char and no one has come and thrown 100plat their way.
anyone else notice this begging?



I saw the same thing in M59 when I played there. Newbies begging for
things. Very annoying. When you suggest that they perhaps take the time
they are spending begging to go kill something and earn their way, they get
highly insulted.

My Lvl 30 ranger friend actually had one newbie DEMAND he give him his
armor. (!)

As for twinking, I hate it. Each of my characters earns their way. I could
easily get some very neat stuff for my bard with my lvl 30 druid, but I
don't. That, however, is a personal choice. I know of many ppl who twink
their lower level characters. I suppose in some way, its been earned, since
the player did take the time to get it, rather than just having it handed to
them.

-Treehugger and Songmaker
